channel.title: Installing windows me
channel.description: I don't have a CD to boot up into fat32. Is there a way to directly install windows me inside of windows 7 or off a usb device? (i want to test a game in a low memory environment )

item.title: Installing windows me
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

None of Trees post can even be considered qualm…

  1. a sudden feeling of sickness or nausea
  2. a pang or sudden feeling of doubt, esp concerning moral conduct; scruple
  3. a sudden sensation of misgiving or unease

I don’t feel sick or nausea from his posts, I have no feeling of doubt from any moral conduct,I have no sudden sensation of misgiving or unease…

Read full topic

item.title: Installing windows me
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:457004”]Oi! T_R that was once, and it was mostly a lulz x.X

Tree a common quote comes to mind

if you don’t have anything nice to say, don’t say anything at all[/quote] Disrespect me again, and I have no qualms reporting your posts.

All my opinions are based on what you post. Expressing them hardly goes against any conditions i signed up to when i registered here. I really couldn’t care less if you disagree on how i word them. This forum is full of harsh truths.
Now go play with your pony.

Read full topic
